altername_name: Sorcery Saga I: The Fiery Kindergarten Graduation
name: Madou Monogatari I: Honoo no Sotsuenji
overview: Madou Monogatari I: Honoo No Sotsuenji is the PC-Engine CD remake Madou Monogatari I in a more fully colorful form like Madou Monogatari: Genesis. Like the original story, Arle must collect three spheres and defeat Fudoushi in the tower in order to graduate kindergarten.
